verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* a \w book|strong="G0975"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w within|strong="G2081"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* on the \w backside|strong="G3693"\w*, \w sealed|strong="G2696"\w* with \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w seals|strong="G4973"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w strong|strong="G2478"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w proclaiming|strong="G2784"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w loose|strong="G3089"\w* the \w seals|strong="G4973"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, was \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* to \w look|strong="G0991"\w* \w thereon|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w wept|strong="G2799"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w read|strong="G0314"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* to \w look|strong="G0991"\w* \w thereon|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Weep|strong="G2799"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w Lion|strong="G3023"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Juda|strong="G2448"\w*, the \w Root|strong="G4491"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, hath \w prevailed|strong="G3528"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w loose|strong="G3089"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w seals|strong="G4973"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* a \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it had been \w slain|strong="G4969"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w Spirits|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* sent \w forth|strong="G0649"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he had \w taken|strong="G2983"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \add and\add* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* one of them \w harps|strong="G2788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w vials|strong="G5357"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of \w odours|strong="G2368"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w sung|strong="G0103"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w song|strong="G5603"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* to \w take|strong="G2983"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* the \w seals|strong="G4973"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* thou wast \w slain|strong="G4969"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hast \w redeemed|strong="G0059"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w kindred|strong="G5443"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* hast \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* unto \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w beheld|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* round \w about|strong="G2943"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* was ten thousand \w times|strong="G3461"\w* ten \w thousand|strong="G3461"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thousands|strong="G5505"\w* of \w thousands|strong="G5505"\w*;

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w Worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* that was \w slain|strong="G4969"\w* to \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strength|strong="G2479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w creature|strong="G2938"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* such \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, heard \w I|strong="G0191"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Blessing|strong="G2129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G2904"\w*, \add be\add* unto \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \add and\add* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* him that \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.
